listing.listing_description: With a prime location, private spa and personalized service, Chalet Amazon Creek is the ultimate Chamonix retreat. Set beside a creek just outside the town, this incredible property boasts breathtaking views of the Aiguille du Midi—and a location only a short drive from the Mont Blanc ski resort. Its charming interiors and five bedrooms can welcome up to ten on a ski getaway with friends or a luxury holiday with family.Enjoy champagne, canapés and fresh flowers on arrival, daily breakfast and four-course dinners on six nights of the week. Challenge yourself on the slopes, then soothe tired muscles in a spa area with a jetted tub, hammam and sauna or relax in the home theater. If you’re visiting during the summer, take in the views of the French Alps from an expansive outdoor living area with a pool, hot tub and barbecue.With its pitched roof and wood and stone walls, this vacation rental wholeheartedly embraces classic Alpine style. Spend evenings cozied up on chocolate leather sofas around the wood-burning fireplace in the sitting area, or satisfying après-ski appetites at the adjacent dining table. Though chef service is included in your stay, the modern kitchen is fully equipped.The chalet has one bedroom with a queen bed and four with two twin beds each; all five have en-suite bathrooms, and the twin beds can be combined into queen beds if desired. Several of the bedrooms have their own lounge areas, terraces or mountain views—not to mention a warm, welcoming ambience.Despite its serene wooded setting, Chalet Amazon Creek is only a short drive from the base of the Mont Blanc ski resort, home to some of Europe’s best pistes (and off-piste areas) and, for summer visitors, the beautiful Chamonix Golf Club. For tempting window shopping, a honeymoon-worthy gourmet dinner or a stroll down pretty pedestrian streets, make the short trip into downtown Chamonix.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Reach into the pristine heart of Portugal’s Atlantic coast at this private villa within Quinta da Comporta. A boutique wellness resort designed by architect Miguel Câncio Martins, the Quinta is a celebration of the region’s cultural and natural heritage, as well as a microcosm of Comporta’s unique luxury lifestyle. Your rental includes a private pool and access to the resort’s top-class amenities, while the sands of Pego and Carvalhal are just minutes away.The home’s design honors the rustic elegance of Comporta, with furniture and decor crafted from traditional bumho and vime. Nestled amid the sandy seaside landscape, its luminous spaces open to sweeping views of rice fields and the resort’s gardens. The symmetrical structure features 2 ground-floor suites flanking the central living area and pool, crowned by an upstairs master suite with balcony. Try your hand at Portuguese cuisine in the fully equipped kitchen, and sip the region’s wines by the wood-burning fireplace.Comporta’s natural riches have been protected passionately over the generations, offering an almost primordial sanctuary for travelers and celebrities in need of escape. One of its most prominent transplants is the French gardener and landscape designer Louis Albert Broglie, responsible for the Quinta’s bio-gardens. The resort’s unique spa offers replenishing treatments extracted from locally cultivated rice, while its restaurant, bar, and wine cellar showcase the region’s unique flavors. Enjoy ocean swimming and beachfront dining at Praia do Pego, and experience some of Iberia’s finest restaurants in Comporta town.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With close-up views of the Spanish Steps, Condotti Street, and Rome’s stunning rooftop skyline, The Nest’s central location cannot be beaten. Just a short walk from numerous attractions, museums, restaurants, and cafes, this five-bedroom luxury penthouse is the perfect home base for a family vacation or retreat with friends and colleagues. All five bedrooms feature king-sized beds and modern en-suite bathrooms. And, the rooftop patio and spacious lounge areas make The Nest ideal for hosting. A vacation rental this spacious in the center of Rome is an incredible find.Inside, The Nest is decorated with marble flooring, chandelier lighting, Romanesque works of art, and designer furniture. Dark wood accents and state of the art electronics and appliances add a touch of sleek, modern style to the old-world influence of The Nest’s luxurious atmosphere. The rooftop terrace is like your own private cafe, with a striped awning and authentic clay roofing tiles, it’s the perfect place to enjoy your morning coffee or a nightcap after an incredible day.The Nest’s tech features include Wi-Fi, television, air conditioning, and a washer/dryer. At breakfast, you can enjoy a complimentary buffet every day, and Espresso from the machine in the fully equipped kitchen. On the rooftop terrace, there’s an alfresco dining area and a furnished lounge on the opposite side. And, if you need a little extra sleeping space, there’s a sofa bed in the living room.Within a short walk from your luxurious downtown penthouse, you’ll have access to dozens of Rome’s most famous sites, like the Spanish Steps, Piazza di Spagna, and the Pantheon. Truly an amazing walking city, every inch of Rome is steeped in historical significance. If you’d like to do some shopping at high-end fashion houses, Via Condotti is two minutes away. For dinner, Pierluigi is just a short walk towards the River Tiber; it’s one of Rome’s most famous restaurants. Travel across the river, and you’ll find Vatican City. And, just under fifteen minutes away, by car, you could visit the Roman Forum, the Colosseum, and Campo De’ Fiori.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: This sublime, five-bedroom waterfront villa in Es Cubells is situated within a gated community in one of the finest luxury residential districts in Ibiza. Featuring an extraordinary overall design, exquisite outdoor and indoor living spaces, panoramic views of the Mediterranean Sea, and an outstanding location near the beach at Es Torrent, the five-bedroom Villa Yelda is a dream vacation rental on this world-renowned isle of leisure and joy.Situated on a 700-square-meter estate overlooking the vast expanse of azure sea, the villa includes an expansive outdoor terrace, framed by lush gardens, with ample space for relaxation and entertainment in the sensuous breeze. Numerous connected lounges and niches create an enchanting space for large parties or intimate gatherings, with the veranda's slatted cover providing light or shade as desired. A lovely plunge pool includes a shallow end for children, and you'll also enjoy access to a larger swimming pool in your community. A lovely alfresco table invites you to delectable meals, paired with fine Spanish wine and the Mediterranean breeze. In the fresh morning, enjoy outdoor yoga and a restorative massage.The villa's luminous interior provides a cool yet cozy setting for festive nights and bright mornings, its elegantly minimalist décor accentuating the presence of the sea. Prepare meals in the fully equipped kitchen, as guest enjoy drinks in the cocktail area. Then gather around the beautiful, ten-person table for a memorable feast, before venturing out for exciting night. Upon returning, cuddle up in the cinema room with your favorite movies, or savor the night air on the illuminated veranda.The bedroom suites are serene and sumptuous, providing total comfort and privacy for quiet downtime. All enjoy stunning sea views, direct access to furnished terraces, and superb ensuite bathrooms. The master bedroom has a king bed, while each of the four guestrooms has a double bed. With room for ten, the villa is ideal for destination wedding guests.Villa Yelda is ideally located for enjoying Es Cubells and its stunning surroundings. The beach at Es Torrent is within walking distance or a few minutes by car, while San José and Ibiza Town are both a short drive away. listing.listing_description: When it comes to superb locations, few Amalfi Coast villas can rival Positanese. Enviably situated in the heart of Positano, this four-bedroom villa is within easy walking distance of local restaurants in this charming seaside town. Better yet, for beach lovers, it’s just a two-minute walk down to Positano’s pebbled beach - about 170 steps.While the Positanese interiors are appealing, the highlight of the home is undoubtedly the spacious terrace, with its hand-painted floor tiles and spectacular views of the ornate church cupola, the town of Positano, and the islands beyond - the perfect backdrop for al fresco meals or a lazy afternoon of sunbathing. After a day of sightseeing, come back here for a pre-dinner glass of wine with your guests.Light and bright, Positanese's elegant interiors open onto the terrace through arched doorways with wrought-iron details. Traditional yet comfortable, the villa features vaulted ceilings and tiled floors throughout the dining room and living room. The well-equipped Italian style kitchen has direct access to both the dining room and terrace, for both indoor and al fresco dining options.The beautiful Amalfi Coast views continue upstairs, where two bedrooms have small private balconies framed by the bright pink bougainvillea growing up the villa wall. Each of the villa’s four bedrooms is conveniently equipped with a private en-suite bathroom, as well as a flat-screen television.Among the most picturesque towns in Italy, Positano is famed for its beautiful pastel-painted buildings, pebbled beach, and heavenly Italian restaurants. Positanese is ideal base for exploring Amalfi Coast attractions, from historic sites to winery tours. When on the Amalfi Coast, the quickest route is often by sea - ask your Concierge about local hydrofoil service or private boat charters to Capri, Sorrento and more.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
